body.name: Mainfini Men's Shawl Collar Pullover Sweater Slim Fit Lapel Collar Sweater
features: Fabric type MATERIAL - 50% Acrylic, 27% Polyester, 23% Nylon. This men's sherpa pullover is made from high-quality fabric, soft, warm, and comfortable to wear.
Care instructions CARE INSTRUCTIONS - Hand-washed or machine-washed. Machine wash cold setting keeps colors vibrant and ensures long-lasting durability, do not bleach.
Origin NOTE - This Product is Made in Our Own Manufacturer Through an Emphasis on Quality and Customer Service. More Men's Clothing Can Search "Mainfini".
Closure type SIZE AND COLOR - Please Carefully Refer To Our Detailed Size Chart or Other Customer Comments Before You Purchase (Don't Refer To Amazon's Generic Size Chart). Pull-On
SHAWL COLLAR - Fashionable v-neck design brings you a comfortable wearing experience in cold winter, you can have a fold-over collar or a stand-up collar.
FASHION VERSION - The Knit Pullover Sweater stretches for the utmost comfort, with ribbed cuffs and hem, and a regular slim fit to lock warmth and keep you warm and handsome.
SOFT & WARM - Fine-knitted fluffy fabric traps heat without adding bulk, is lightweight but thermal, does not shrink and fade, and keeps you feeling comfortable and warm in fall and winter.

WIDE APPLICATIONS - This casual sweater could be paired with classic jeans or casual slacks, you can create any style you want with this pullover sweater, ideal festival gift for your dad, husband, boyfriend, or friends.
SATISFACTORY SERVICE - Friendly customer service and quality assurance. If you have any questions or suggestions, please send us an email and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater with shawl collar
reviews.reviewText: Good quality. It was a Christmas' gift and he lik ed it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My husband LOVES this sweater!
reviews.reviewText: The product matches perfectly to the product photos and description.The fabric is of very nice quality. It is not too thick but has a great weight to it to keep you warm in colder weather. It feels on the softer side of sweater material but still has a cable knit feel to it. My husband loves wearing it. Some cable knit sweaters can feel itchy, but this one is definitely very soft and comfortable to wear. No itchy feeling even after a few washes.The fit is great too! My husband usually wears an XL in shirts/sweaters so I decided to order XL. It has a nice loose fit to it that's comfortable and doesn't hug his body too much. If you want it to be a little more snug or form-fitting, you could even size down 1 size. It's perfect for work or any dinner out! It's very versatile and perfect for the cold weather season!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater - but had a funny smell at first
reviews.reviewText: The reason I am only giving this three stars is because it had a funky, musty smell when it arrived and it took 3 washes with scented detergent to get rid of the weird smell. It's almost as if this was sitting in a humid shipping container for a long time. For this reason I'm not sure this would be a good gift for someone. You would definitely want to wash this before wearing it.Now that the smell is gone, I am satisfied with it. The fabric is a decent weight and the quality is good. This would be well suited for a cooler environment as it's a mid-heavy weight. The material is in the middle range of softness - not super soft but not stiff or scratchy either. If you are someone with dry or sensitive skin, this might not be the the best choice for you.The styling is nice and a sweater like this can be dressed up or down depending on where you are going.I am 5'11 and about 210 lbs and I ordered an XL. The sweater fits as I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unique style, good fit
reviews.reviewText: I'm usually between sizes (L and XL) for sweaters. I decided to go with a Large and that was the right call - the fit is perfect. The shirt isn't too clingy and it is long enough for my unusually long torso. It's a nice feel - I wouldn't say it's the softest material, but I always wear an under shirt, and usually roll up my sleeves so that isn't too much of an issue. Overall, if you like the style of the shirt - this is a great, affordable option!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great style and color
reviews.reviewText: I love this sweater on my husband. I was concerned on if the quality of it would meet up to our expectations and it did without any doubt. Of course I had to immediately wash it twice before he could wear it but once I did, everything was all good from there. It held its shape and color as if it were new right out of packaging. Washed it on delicate (twice, soaked & washed it in cold, fabric softener added each time on rinse cycle) then laid it flat to air dry. The quality is substantial enough that I'm certain this will be part of his sweater collection for many year's to come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, Warm, and Perfect for the Upcoming Cold Weather
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new sweater, so I looked around and found this one by Mainfini and decided to order it.The sweater has a shawl collar and a cable knit finish and lengthwise it is generously "cut" being 29" from the neck down to the hem with the sleeves being 25" long when measured from the shoulder.The sweater is 50% acrylic, 27% polyester, and 23% nylon. It is machine washable on a cold setting and according to the instructions it should be turned inside out first. It can be tumble dried on low.I normally take a "large" in garments like this and that is what I ordered, and it fitted exactly as expected. It weighs about 1.5lbs which is not super heavy but heavy enough!Overall, I am very impressed with this sweater. It looks good, it's comfortable to wear, and it's warm. If you are looking for a comfortable sweater for the upcoming cold weather then I recommend you consider this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sized exactly to description, good quality
reviews.reviewText: Good quality sweater, very thick, nice feel to the fabric.The size chart on the post is exactly correct, and I'm mentioning this because I struggled to find my right size. This is a boxy, regular fit sweater - I was hoping for a slimmer chest, and almost chose a medium because the chest seemed much larger than what I normally wear, but I needed the arm length of a large (6'0", 170lbs). I chose the large - as advertised, the chest was too big and the arms were just right (a medium would not have the arm length). I'm not able to wear this, but their advertisement was exactly right so they still get five stars (again, it's otherwise very nice!).If you prefer regular-fit sweaters, refer to the size chart and you'll be very happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm wearing this right now
reviews.reviewText: I really like the fit, and color. It's perfect sizing and it looks amazing.
